title: Native Earth
creator_credit: John Heyer and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: A study of Australia’s responsibilities and administration issues in Papua New Guinea immediately after World War 2, with particular emphasis on the life and the needs of Papuans. Commentary by Peter Finch, researched by Catherine Duncan, script by Catherine Duncan, photography by Frank Bagnall, music by John Kay.
